data.text: Amasɔtɔ Alatalaa xɔlɔn godoma nɛn siyane birin fari,
E faxa muxune luma nɛn biraxi bɔxɔn ma
Sare kurune34.4 Mɛn kaane yi sarene batuma na waxatini. birin kalama nɛn
Ala naxa, “N ma silanfanna bata sarene wunla ramini han!
Wunla bata so Alatalaa silanfanna yiren birin ma
Bayo, gbeeɲɔxɔ lɔxɔn nan na ra Alatala xɔn,
Edɔn yamanan baane findima nɛn dolen na.
Na yi findi xutunxunbane nun sagalene konna ra,
A muxu gbeene mi fa luma na,
Wudi ɲali kanne solima e manga banxine kui nɛn,
Saɲin fan a soden toma na nin,
Xa ɛ Alatalaa kɛdin kui to,
A tan nan e dɔxɔdene ragidima.
